title: 新约 - 以弗所书(Ephesians) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 以弗所书(Ephesians) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 6 章 )

lineList.en: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;
lineList.cn: 所以你们该效法神，好像蒙慈爱的儿女一样。

lineList.en: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.
lineList.cn: 也要凭爱心行事，正如基督爱我们，为我们舍了自己，当作馨香的供物，和祭物，献与神。

lineList.en: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints;
lineList.cn: 至于淫乱，并一切污秽，或是贪婪，在你们中间连题都不可，方合圣徒的体统。

lineList.en: Neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.
lineList.cn: 淫词，妄语，和戏笑的话，都不相宜，总要说感谢的话。

lineList.en: For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.
lineList.cn: 因为你们确实的知道，无论是淫乱的，是污秽的，是有贪心的，在基督和神的国里，都是无分的。有贪心的，就与拜偶像的一样。

lineList.en: Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.
lineList.cn: 不要被人虚浮的话欺哄。因这些事，神的忿怒必临到那悖逆之子。

lineList.en: Be not ye therefore partakers with them.
lineList.cn: 所以你们不要与他们同夥。

lineList.en: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:
lineList.cn: 从前你们是暗昧的，但如今在主里面是光明的，行事为人就当像光明的子女。

lineList.en: (For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)
lineList.cn: 光明所结的果子，就是一切良善，公义，诚实。

lineList.en: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.
lineList.cn: 总要察验何为主所喜悦的事。

lineList.en: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.
lineList.cn: 那暗昧无益的事，不要与人同行，倒要责备行这事的人

lineList.en: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.
lineList.cn: 因为他们暗中所行的，就是题起来，也是可耻的。

lineList.en: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.
lineList.cn: 凡事受了责备，就被光显明出来。因为一切能显明的，就是光。

lineList.en: Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.
lineList.cn: 所以主说，你这睡着的人，当醒过来，从死里复活，基督就要光照你了。

lineList.en: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,
lineList.cn: 你们要谨慎行事，不要像愚昧人，当像智慧人。

lineList.en: Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
lineList.cn: 要爱惜光阴，因为现今的世代邪恶。

lineList.en: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord is.
lineList.cn: 不要作糊涂人，要明白主的旨意如何。

lineList.en: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;
lineList.cn: 不要醉酒，酒能使人放荡，乃要被圣灵充满。

lineList.en: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;
lineList.cn: 当用诗章，颂词，灵歌，彼此对说，口唱心和的赞美主。

lineList.en: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;
lineList.cn: 凡事要奉我们主耶稣基督的名，常常感谢父神。

lineList.en: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.
lineList.cn: 又当存敬畏基督的心，彼此顺服。

lineList.en: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.
lineList.cn: 你们作妻子的，当顺服自己的丈夫，如同顺服主。

lineList.en: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.
lineList.cn: 因为丈夫是妻子的头，如同基督是教会的头。他又是教会全体的救主。

lineList.en: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing.
lineList.cn: 教会怎样顺服基督，妻子也要怎样凡事顺服丈夫。

lineList.en: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
lineList.cn: 你们作丈夫的，要爱你们的妻子，正如基督爱教会，为教会舍己。

lineList.en: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,
lineList.cn: 要用水藉着道，把教会洗净，成为圣洁，

lineList.en: That he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
lineList.cn: 可以献给自己，作个荣耀的教会，毫无玷污皱纹等类的病，乃是圣洁没有瑕疵的。

lineList.en: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.
lineList.cn: 丈夫也当照样爱妻子，如同爱自己的身子。爱妻子，便是爱自己了。

lineList.en: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:
lineList.cn: 从来没有人恨恶自己的身子，总是保养顾惜，正像基督待教会一样。

lineList.en: For we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
lineList.cn: 因我们是他身上的肢体。（有古卷在此有就是他的骨他的肉）。

lineList.en: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.
lineList.cn: 为这个缘故，人要离开父母，与妻子连合，二人成为一体。

lineList.en: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.
lineList.cn: 这是极大的奥秘，但我是指着基督和教会说的。

lineList.en: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.
lineList.cn: 然而你们各人都当爱妻子，如同爱自己一样。妻子也当敬重他的丈夫。
